data_table.description: Subject ID, genotype platform, sex, race, age, BMI, smoking status, triglycerides, total cholesterol, LDL, HDL, and placebo pills or simvastatin pills used by Caucasian or African American participants with high or low level of total cholesterol and involved in the "Cholesterol and Pharmacogenetics (CAP) Study" project.

variable.name: GenoPlatform
variable.description: Illumina HumanHap genotyping platform HumanHap300k or HumanHap 610k

variable.name: mTg_SVEV
variable.description: Mean triglyceride level in blood collected at screening and enrollment visits, mg/dL

variable.name: mTg_V2V3
variable.description: Mean triglyceride level in blood collected at visits 2 & 3 (on simvastatin), mg/dL

variable.name: mTC_SVEV
variable.description: Mean total cholesterol level in blood collected at screening and enrollment visits, mg/dL

variable.name: mTC_V2V3
variable.description: Mean total cholesterol level in blood collected at visits 2 & 3 (on simvastatin), mg/dL

variable.name: mLDLC_SVEV
variable.description: Mean low-density lipoprotein cholesterol level in blood collected at screening and enrollment visits, mg/dL

variable.name: mLDLC_V2V3
variable.description: Mean low-density lipoprotein cholesterol level in blood collected at visits 2 & 3 (on simvastatin), mg/dL

variable.name: mHDLC_SVEV
variable.description: Mean high-density lipoprotein cholesterol level in blood collected at screening and enrollment visits, mg/dL

variable.name: mHDLC_V2V3
variable.description: Mean high-density lipoprotein cholesterol level in blood collected at visits 2 & 3 (on simvastatin), mg/dL

variable.name: compliance_EV
variable.description: Enrollment visit placebo pill count compliance (%)

variable.name: compliance_V1
variable.description: Visit 1 (first 2 week period) simvastatin pill count compliance (%)

variable.name: compliance_V2
variable.description: Visit 2 (second 2 week period) simvastatin pill count compliance (%)

variable.name: compliance_V3
variable.description: Visit 3 (third 2 week period) simvastatin pill count compliance (%)
